title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 30.1 - General requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 30.1 - General requirement

State Regulations

Initial statements of, and statements of changes in, the
beneficial ownership of equity securities of a bank or trust company required
to be filed with the superintendent pursuant to Banking Law, section 130(7), should be prepared and filed in accordance with the instructions contained on

Banking Department Forms BO-1 and BO-2, respectively. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
30.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
